org.waarp.openr66.dao

Interface BusinessDAO

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DBBusinessDAO, XMLBusinessDAO

    public interface BusinessDAO
    Interface to interact with Business objects in the persistance layer

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close() 
      void delete(Business business)
      Remove the specified Business object from the persistance layer
      void deleteAll()
      Remove all Business objects from the persistance layer
      boolean exist(String hostid)
      Verify if a Business object with the specified hostid exists in the persistance layer
      List<Business> find(List<Filter> filters)
      Retrieve all Business objects corresponding to the given filters in a List from the persistance layer
      List<Business> getAll()
      Retrieve all Business objects in a List from the persistance layer
      void insert(Business business)
      Insert the specified Business object in the persistance layer
      Business select(String hostid)
      Retrieve the Business object with the specified hostid from the persistance layer
      void update(Business business)
      Update the specified Business object in the persistance layer

    • Method Detail

      • getAll

        List<Business> getAll()
                      throws DAOException
        Retrieve all Business objects in a List from the persistance layer
        Throws:
        DAOException - If data access error occurs

      • find

        List<Business> find(List<Filter> filters)
                    throws DAOException
        Retrieve all Business objects corresponding to the given filters in a List from the persistance layer
        Parameters:
        filters - List of filter
        Throws:
        DAOException - If data access error occurs

      • select

        Business select(String hostid)
                throws DAOException
        Retrieve the Business object with the specified hostid from the persistance layer
        Parameters:
        hostid - Hostid of the Business object requested
        Throws:
        DAOException - If a data access error occurs

      • exist

        boolean exist(String hostid)
              throws DAOException
        Verify if a Business object with the specified hostid exists in the persistance layer
        Parameters:
        hostid - Hostid of the Business object verified
        Returns:
        true if a Business object with the specified hostid exist; false if no Business object correspond to the specified hostid.
        Throws:
        DAOException - If a data access error occurs

      • insert

        void insert(Business business)
            throws DAOException
        Insert the specified Business object in the persistance layer
        Parameters:
        business - Business object to insert
        Throws:
        DAOException - If a data access error occurs

      • update

        void update(Business business)
            throws DAOException
        Update the specified Business object in the persistance layer
        Parameters:
        business - Business object to update
        Throws:
        DAOException - If a data access error occurs

      • delete

        void delete(Business business)
            throws DAOException
        Remove the specified Business object from the persistance layer
        Parameters:
        business - Business object to insert
        Throws:
        DAOException - If a data access error occurs
